page.title: 06Family '85' ,Pitreavie.
page.content:
Family '85', PitreavieThis is the particular lifestyle of family 85. On Sunday mornings the boy and girl of family 85 go to Sunday School. After Sunday School the family 85 meet and go to Church service. Later they go to the swimming pool at Dunfermline High School. At night the boy and girl go to a youth club at the Community Centre. On Mondays after school mum goes to Keep Fit classes and dad to Car Maintenance. When they get back, they play tennis with coaching for the children. On Wednesday nights the boy goes to Scouts and the girl to dancing lessons. Thursday the plays golf with a coach. The girl goes to guides.
Mark Wilson.
